thread.title: Prada shares soar as China demand spurs growth

title: Prada shares soar as China demand spurs growth
text:
Prada shares soar as China demand spurs growth Monday, March 12, 2018 - 01:10 
Shares in Prada surged 14 percent on Monday after the Italian luxury goods maker said it had stemmed a slide in sales in the second half of 2017 and expected to see growth continue this year. Ciara Lee reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Shares in Prada surged 14 percent on Monday after the Italian luxury goods maker said it had stemmed a slide in sales in the second half of 2017 and expected to see growth continue this year.
